document.full_text: greed in the nuclear industry and corporate influence over the u.n. watchdog for atomic energy may doom japan to a spreading nuclear disaster, one of the men brought in to clean up chernobyl said on tuesday.
document.title: chernobyl clean-up expert slams japan, iaea
lines_and_colors: greed in the nuclear industry and corporate influence over the u.n. watchdog for atomic energy may doom japan to a spreading nuclear disaster, one of the men brought in to clean up chernobyl said on tuesday.
